Player History
Drafted in 16th round, 249th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/2/2015...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,131,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/25/2016 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Injured on 8/25/2016 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,131,429 through salary arbitration...
Had first career hit on 6/27/2017, off Gary Reith (HOU)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2017, going 5-0, 1.64...
Injured on 9/12/2017 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 8-9 weeks...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $7,728,571 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/2018, going 5-1, 2.55...
8/9/2018: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (B), $14,950,000 per year, for 6 years.
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/2019, going 2-0, 1.04...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2021, going 3-1, 0.63...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2021...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2022...
Injured on 5/14/2023 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
